name: Four County Mental Health Center, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Four County Mental Health Center, Inc. is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Independence, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $28.9M in Medicaid payments across 268K claims.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $28.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
